Generate 25-30 high-quality flashcards optimized for active recall, spaced repetition, and Bloom's Taxonomy progression. **Learning Objectives (cover evenly across cards):** [insert learning_objectives array here] **Scaffolding Layers (distribute: 6-8 cards per layer):** [insert scaffolding object here] **Active Learning Integration:** Inspire card backs with hooks from [insert active_learning object here] to encourage discussion/problem-solving. **Flashcard Schema:** Strictly follow [insert flashcard_schema object here]. Vary types: 40% MCQ, 30% short answer/cloze, 30% scenario analysis. Ensure web-grounded: Use examples like benign 'ls -la /tmp', malicious 'powershell.exe -nop -w hidden -c IEX...', T1036.011 overwriting, CAR-2013-07-001.
